question: 合唱団
sourceMnemonic: People who <kanji>join</kanji> in a <kanji>chant</kanji> <kanji>group</kanji> are people who are in a <vocabulary>chorus</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>choir</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>合</ja> is pretty weird. It's a <ja>がっ</ja> instead of a <ja>ごう</ja>. Just imagine a bunch of people in a chorus singing "ga ga ga ga gaaaa!"
